posts.postContent:
[Welcome to Murim Online — a world ruled by true power.]
[An abnormal device error has prevented logout.]
[Would you like to try disconnecting once more?]

Kim Sang-an, a cold-blooded loan shark.

When his sister, a school teacher, takes her own life after being relentlessly tormented by her students...

He becomes their new homeroom teacher to collect the "debt" of her life.

A debt collector who would crawl into the depths of hell to get what's owed, and students who are nothing short of demons.

A brutal "teacher-student" relationship begins now.

posts.postTitle: I Became a Munchkin Skill Thief
posts.postContent: Once a young man named krash was looked down upon as a "failure" and betrayed by those he called allies. But on the brink of death, he obtained a miracle: a one-time "Regression." He can never use that power again, but with his knowledge of the future, he begins his second life. To save the world from ruin—and to exact revenge on those who once trampled over him—he sets his plan in motion. Steal skills, refine them, and stack them high. Surpassing even the most broken "cheats," the ultimate "Skill Thief" awakens!
posts.alternativeTitles: チート級スキル泥棒になった

posts.postContent:
Having lost his family to the horrors of a Dungeon Outbreak, a young man named Yuki is cornered by the ultimate dungeon boss—Libel.

Forced into a contract to become a [Monster Tamer], his path is set.

Form pacts with all manner of monsters and conquer every dungeon in existence!
posts.alternativeTitles: 魔物召喚でダンジョン無双　魔王軍と契約した最強冒険者

posts.postContent:
By The Studio Who Brought US [ Reincarnated as the Grand Duke's Third Son ]


Arhan Karavan loses everything to a Swordmaster whose name he never even learns.

In despair as cold as death itself, his legendary ancestor—Liam Karavan, known only through myth—appears before him.

Liam offers Arhan a single path to vengeance.

“Devour the sword, and make the power dwelling within it your own.”

From that moment on, the boy Arhan’s revenge begins,
and the long-forgotten name of the Karavan family starts to awaken once more.

posts.postTitle: Absolute Domination at Level 0 Using My Analysis Skill
posts.postContent:
The "Disaster Beasts"—monsters that suddenly appeared on Earth, plunging humanity into an unprecedented crisis. Tenma Itsuki, who lost his parents to these creatures, is chosen to become an "Awakener," one of the few humans gifted with supernatural powers.

However, the class he awakens to is a "Rare Job" that defies all common sense! Despite being "Level 0," his ability is a cheat-tier power that allows him to analyze enemy skills and infinitely boost his own stats.

Driven by a thirst for revenge, Tenma sets his sights on becoming the "Strongest Human." This high-octane, exhilarating supernatural battle starts now!
posts.alternativeTitles: 最強のレベル0 -解析スキルで完全無双-

posts.postContent: Sejun, your average Seoul underdog, didn’t expect to grow tomatoes full-time when he stumbled into the mysterious dungeon full of monster quests and extravagant rewards. Yet, there he was, as a farmer growing and selling cash crops while clearing numerous quests that came his way. Will Sejun make it out of the dungeon with the plush rewards he hoped for? At least he has what it takes: optimism, resourcefulness, and a group of loyal furry friends.
posts.alternativeTitles: The Top Dungeon Farmer, 나혼자 탑에서 농사
posts.author: Lim Hyeong

posts.postContent:
Jeokun Mountain—the immediate border between the Demon Army and the Allied Federation.

It is the final strategic stronghold where training and live combat happen simultaneously.

The Federation Army continues its conscription and selection process to find the 10 Transcendent prophesied in the sacred texts and reclaim the lost territory.

However, what was more terrifying than the war with the Demon Army... was the absurdity and abuse of military life.

posts.postTitle: Gray Ash: The Exiled Imperial Knight’s Rise in the Dungeon Kingdom
posts.postContent:
Ash, a young man who excelled as the captain of the Imperial Knights and was engaged to a noble lady, lived a perfectly smooth, enviable life.

However, one day, he was abruptly informed of the annulment of his engagement and his expulsion from the Knights. Disgusted with everything, Ash left the Empire and journeyed to a new land: the Kingdom of Rosebel.

In this kingdom, which has achieved prosperity surpassing the Empire through the power of Dungeons, Ash makes a fresh start as a Hunter, rapidly gaining renown for his overwhelming strength. Meanwhile, back in the Empire, Ulka, a junior who greatly admired him, follows Ash's trail and heads for the Kingdom.

The curtain now rises on a tale of reversal that will repaint his gray life.
posts.alternativeTitles: 灰色のアッシュ　～帝国騎士団をクビになった俺はダンジョン都市で灰色の人生をひっくり返す～

posts.postContent: Bill Back, the blacksmith who forged the hero's sword, was content living an ordinary life. However, rising unrest throughout the kingdom begins to threaten even his existence, until he is eventually drawn deep into a spiral of uncontrollable events as the situation rapidly deteriorates.

posts.postTitle: A Wimp’s Strategy Guide to Conquer the Tower

posts.alternativeTitles: 天才治癒士のリスタート

posts.postContent:
Yoo Ji-tae, a Regressor possessing the ultimate power.

Yet, despite wielding such strength and regressing repeatedly, he was unable to prevent the destruction of Earth.

The cause of the apocalypse was four baby dragons who came to Earth for 'Amusement'.

This is the story of a man who seeks to prevent the end of the world in this regression not through absolute force, but by becoming their guardian.

Narukami Subaru, the "Master of Thunder," was once hailed as the strongest player. However, during a Tower raid, he was betrayed and killed by a trusted friend.

In his final moments, he exhausted all his power to save his comrades. Yet, despite feeling death take him, he awoke to find himself reincarnated 20 years in the future.

In this new era, the truth has been buried, and the traitor, Kyojo Itsuki, reigns supreme as the top player. To exact his revenge—and for the sake of the allies who might still be waiting for him—Subaru must become strong again, and fast.

"Doing things the same way as before won't work."

Given a second chance at life, the former champion chooses a new path... Live Streaming!

It doesn't matter if the world is full of streamers imitating the legendary Narukami Subaru.

"Because I'm the real deal."
posts.alternativeTitles: 転生ストリーマー, Reincarnated Streamer

posts.postContent:
– The planet [Earth] has entered the abnormal state [Apocalypse].

– You have failed in saving the Earth. The Authority, [Vintage Clock (EX)] rewinds the world’s time.

For Yu Jitae, it was a message he had seen many times.

It was tiresome.

It would have been great had he died with everyone else.

But he couldn’t, for his authorities that made him the strongest existence, brought him back in time whenever he died.

And even with his strength, he couldn’t protect the broad earth against the maddened dragons.

– The world’s time will soon begin.

As the clock resumed ticking in the direction it should, his 7th iteration came to a start.

Fortunately, he finally had the gist of it.

Narukami Subaru, the "Master of Thunder," was once hailed as the strongest player. However, during a Tower raid, he was betrayed and killed by a trusted friend.

In his final moments, he exhausted all his power to save his comrades. Yet, despite feeling death take him, he awoke to find himself reincarnated 20 years in the future.

In this new era, the truth has been buried, and the traitor, Kyojo Itsuki, reigns supreme as the top player. To exact his revenge—and for the sake of the allies who might still be waiting for him—Subaru must become strong again, and fast.

"Doing things the same way as before won't work."

Given a second chance at life, the former champion chooses a new path... Live Streaming!

It doesn't matter if the world is full of streamers imitating the legendary Narukami Subaru.

"Because I'm the real deal."
posts.alternativeTitles: 転生ストリーマー, Reincarnated Streamer

posts.postContent:
Eugene, a vampire, was murdered as a mere sacrifice for a Holy Knight's glory after six months on the run.

> However, after ending his life in regret, he was granted a chance to regress.

"I will never die like that...
posts.alternativeTitles: 뱀파이어 로드로 사는 법, How to Live As the Vampire Lord

posts.postTitle: Reincarnated as the Grand Duke's Third Son
posts.alternativeTitles: 환생했더니 대공의 셋째 아들, A Mercenary’s Rebirth Among Nobles
posts.author: BELF

posts.postTitle: The Regressed Extra Becomes a Genius
posts.postContent:
The story delves into the life of Kim Seon-woo, who got pulled into a famous novel and decided to live a quiet life as a side character.

One day, the protagonist of said novel died…

“…Do you expect me to believe this?”

He ends up regressing back in time – back to his first day within the novel.

Eugene, a vampire, was murdered as a mere sacrifice for a Holy Knight's glory after six months on the run.

> However, after ending his life in regret, he was granted a chance to regress.

"I will never die like that again. If I truly have returned to the past, I will do whatever it takes... I will not live with regret a second time."

Cheon Taesan, the Scholar Specialist in Reforming Scoundrels.

He gains renown by rehabilitating the most notorious ruffians in the Martial Arts World (Murim). Born with the Heavenly Martial Body, he faces a cruel fate where he must acquire the Seven Stars Primordial Qi just to extend his lifespan. As he interacts with the mysterious Ice Star Body, he draws closer to the hidden truths of the Martial Arts World.

There were young men who formed a merchants' association to fight against local thugs and protect their businesses themselves.

But after constant clashes, they were accused of being gangsters themselves, blocking their future prospects.

At that moment, Hyun Tae-cheol, the core of the group, resolved:

"Rather than staying here like this, let's go up to Seoul and become true big shots."

Accepting his proposal, Kwon Tae-soo, Kim Min-kyu, and likeminded others joined him as they departed for the great city of Seoul.

A story of youth struggling desperately to survive in a strange and ruthless world.

— The chronicle of those fierce days.

posts.postTitle: The Demon King Overrun by Heroes
posts.postContent:
"I faithfully followed the 'Demon King's Textbook,' only to be killed by the heroes.

You’re telling me that my tower and I were just a hunting ground tailor-made for them?

Now that I’ve gained a second chance at life through regression, the hell with that sh*tty Textbook—feed it to the Orcs!

This is the survival story of Berge, the screwball(?) Demon King!"

A mage named YuJin—gentle-hearted and righteous, but looks a little... scary. —makes a fateful choice: he will take Jeong Ain, the daughter of his late Master, under his wing and shape her into a Grand Mage.

In a world rescued by magic only to be plunged into chaos by its power, their destinies intertwine.

Together with the enigmatic yujin, step onto the perilous path toward becoming the next legendary Grand Mage!

The Heavenly Demon is on the verge of unifying the world.
After a final battle with his arch-nemesis, the Ice Witch, the two die together—
only to be reincarnated as ordinary human twin siblings?!

Hello! The webtoon <Devil & Ice> is updated every Tuesday.

We look forward to your support and love!

After dying in an unexpected accident, Kim Yohan is reincarnated as Johan Aitz of the prestigious Aitz family.
Despite being born a noble, Johan ranks dead last within his own household.
To make matters worse, this world is a harsh and brutal medieval era.

“The only one you can trust is yourself.”
To survive in this law-of-the-jungle world, he needs money and power!

While training relentlessly using the knowledge from his modern-life days,
Johan encounters Kaegal, the Master of Poison from the empire’s greatest assassin guild—the Nesos Guild…

posts.postTitle: The Player of the Fallen  Family
posts.postContent: Riyun, the youngest son of the prestigious Sermin Family of the Dreia Continent. The family, once peaceful and prosperous, began to collapse after the disappearance of his father and brothers. And at the moment everything crumbled, Riyun was captured by the Phaton Family and met his end after unimaginable torture. However, when he opened his eyes, he was no longer in reality but in Adeon, an endless battlefield and the playground of the gods. A place where countless players lost their lives. There, Riyun grew into the Ghost King, a master player who had mastered every class of assassin, necromancer, and spectre, and he dared to challenge the gods themselves. Though he was defeated and died once again, his story did not end there. The moment he awakened again, he found himself returned to his twelve-year-old self, still in possession of a player’s power. To stop the downfall of his family and reclaim everything he had lost, Riyun begins turning reality itself into his own game board. The first step is bloody revenge against the Phaton Family, which is the very great house that brought down the Sermins and murdered him.

One day, Baek Woo-hyun, an ordinary college student, returned after being transported to the dimension of Reverse Planet, the world’s most popular online virtual-reality game.

He had dreamed of coming back… but the damn game was still running as if nothing had happened, and the ghosts of the comrades who died “over there” kept urging him to avenge them at every turn.

In the end, Woo-hyun logs back into Reverse Planet to uncover the connection between the game and the other world. Fortunately—or perhaps unfortunately—he doesn’t get sent back “over there,” but he happens to appear on the stream of a certain streamer he meets by chance… and an anonymous viewer, Viewer 62, reaches out to him.

― How does it feel to have returned to reality?
posts.alternativeTitles: Echoes of the Reverse Planet 초인의 게임방송

posts.postContent:
Byeon Hogil, a C-rank killer from the assassination organization Glory Club, somehow ends up becoming… a lawyer.

Where there’s a sky, there’s also a bottom!
Set in the same universe as Killer Pietro, this is the story of our ordinary, small-town citizen-turned-killer Byeon Hogil — someone who wouldn’t even get to see Pietro from afar.

He was just an ordinary man running a small restaurant.
But behind that quiet life hid his true identity…
A legendary hardcore veteran who spent thousands of hours mastering a zombie-survival VR game.

Then one day, the world changed.
The virtual battleground he had died and revived in countless times suddenly became reality.

A sudden zombie apocalypse erupts.
At the same moment, he awakens a mysterious ability to open dimensional gates—
allowing him to travel freely between Earth and another world to prepare for the coming end.

Soon, familiar figures from his gaming past begin to “log in” to reality:
the infinitely respawning Rabbit Princess,
the monster-controlling DuckButt-QuackQuack,
and other absurdly overpowered comrades from the old days.

Civilization collapses.
The line between humanity and survival instinct grows faint.
But he stands firm.

“This isn’t a game.
But for me… it’s a battlefield I know better than anyone.”

As the strongest former players gather at the end of the world,
one final choice awaits them all—
posts.alternativeTitles: 아포칼립스의 고인물, The Apocalypse’s Ultimate Veteran

posts.postContent:
​Heroes of Gauri, Conquer Another World!

The most glorious name in this land, Gauri.

​The one who protected that name.

People call him the Steel Emperor!

​The last Great General of the fallen Gauri (Goguryeo), “Go Jincheon.”

At the moment of their fall, he and his elite unit, the 'Black-Armored Demon Cavalry', fall into another world.

​A strange land where various races such as Elves, Orcs, Dwarves, and Wizards live.

​If they cannot return

There is no choice but to establish a new Gauri.

Go Jincheon raises his banner once more for the conquest of the continent.

Set in "Fantra Land," a VRMMO directly linked to real money, a young man in debt named Ren was playing as the "support class" [Architect].

An insanely dedicated hardcore player, he eventually comes to dominate even traps, equipment, and the terrain itself, using his intellect and hard work to overwhelm opponents far stronger than him.
posts.alternativeTitles: 神話級プレイヤーの世界無双

posts.postTitle: The Lucky Plan of An Idol In His Second Life
posts.postContent:
Won Yuha, a trainee who became a "failed idol" after the opportunity to appear on a survival program destined for massive success was unfairly stolen from him.

After six years of struggling to lead his unmotivated group, his career is declared irrecoverable due to a series of scandals involving the other members and a sudden traffic accident.

'If I were born again, I would never become an idol.'

Just as he decides to give up on life, vowing never to dream of such a miserable existence again...

“You're going to let me have your spot on <Design Your Idol>, right?”

...He has returned to six years ago, to the moment he lost the opportunity of a lifetime.

『Tutorial: The Turning Point of Your Life!

Spin the roulette wheel to decide your future!』

On top of that, what the heck is this thing that just appeared before his eyes?

posts.postTitle: I Became the Berserker of the World I Created
posts.alternativeTitles: 俺が創った世界の狂戦士になった

posts.postTitle: The Genius Girl Who Hid Her Martial Arts Achievements
posts.postContent:
A cute and heartwarming martial arts adventure of a genius girl who hides her true accomplishments in the martial world!

Once living in seclusion after losing his inner power, the Sword Demon Dokgo Hyun’s quiet life is suddenly disrupted by the unexpected arrival of Wang Somi, a bold and adorable genius girl. Her presence brings new troubles from the martial world and shakes up his peaceful days. Once a cold-blooded man obsessed only with martial arts, Dokgo Hyun gradually begins to regain his lost warmth and humanity through her.

1. The protagonist, after working his fingers to the bone in the Murim Alliance, retires and heads to his hometown to achieve his dream of becoming a sect leader. Due to his tight financial situation, he purchases a manor that is strangely cheap because of rumors that it is haunted. Then, a system he has never seen or heard of before appears. His bewilderment is brief; the protagonist begins to efficiently recruit disciples and manage the manor's finances and resources using the system. Ultimately, with the help of the system, the protagonist's sect grows rapidly, facing checks and threats from other Murim factions...

posts.postTitle: Survival Story of a Sword King in a Fantasy World
posts.postContent: Ryu Han-Bin was a normal person who just had been discharged from his mandatory military service, when he was transported to another world. Left to fend for himself, he was given the goal of surviving and growing stronger in a desolate world riddled with monsters. The problem is the 'Guideline' that was supposed to be his guiding system to survive is filled with errors.
posts.author: Lim Kyung-bae

posts.postTitle: Blade of Purity: The Strongest Swordsman Who Pierces the Darkness
posts.postContent:
Thirty years ago, the world was plunged into chaos when Fallen Gods and their Fallen Towers suddenly appeared across the lands. From these towers poured forth monsters, and peace was torn away from humanity.

But the eight million gods granted sacred weapons—Divine Arms—to chosen humans of great strength. These heroes conquered the Fallen Towers, purified the Fallen Gods, and restored balance to the world. Among them stood the mightiest of all—the Three Paragons. One of them, Shotaro Kusunoki, wielder of the Blade of Purity, was hailed as the strongest hero of his age.

His younger brother, Hiromu Kusunoki, could only watch in awe, serving as a humble porter just to witness his brother’s glorious battles up close.

However, tragedy struck when the Fallen God Futsunushi possessed Shotaro’s body. As Hiromu faced death at his brother’s hand, he suddenly heard a mysterious voice echo from the Blade of Purity—the voice of the wild god GAYAMARU, who dwelled within the sword.

To save his brother, the boy forges a bond with the god of fury—
and together, they ascend toward ultimate strength!
posts.alternativeTitles: 破邪刀閃　闇を穿つ最強の剣士, Flash of the Exorcising Blade: The Strongest Swordsman Pierces the Darkness

posts.postTitle: Monster Genius Players Really Like Me
posts.postContent: A utility genius baseball player monopolizes the love of all the aces.

Alright, as a slave, I was possessed by a nobleman in a game. But I'm an extra who dies at the hands of future villains? I will rehabilitate them and enjoy the life of a nobleman no matter what! I sponsored the young villains to prevent them from turning to the dark side and helped them overcome their difficult environment. As a result, they all grew up to be excellent and ordinary people, enough to make me feel proud. And so, I became the final mastermind of the kingdom. ...What?
posts.alternativeTitles: 악당들의 후원자가 되었다 Raising Villains the Right Way

posts.postTitle: The Marquis’ Ducal Son is a Martial Artist [Novel]
posts.postContent: In a fantasy world within a novel, I alone can wield martial arts.

The last blacksmith and master artisan left in the world. His hands are crippled in a forge fire, rendering him unable to craft any longer. But then, a virtual reality game, Ares, comes knocking on Hyun-soo’s door.

[Unrepairable Artifact.]

[Cannot be crafted due to level restrictions.]

“Huh? I consider myself a manual blacksmith, though.” For him, no system restrictions apply. The tumultuous game of the genius blacksmith begins.

posts.postTitle: Demonic Frontline: The Thirteenth Flying Dragon [Novel]
posts.postContent:
Once the shame of his family, now an overpowered martial arts prodigy with a perfect memory?!

"I died and returned to the front lines, and this time, I'm no longer the pig I used to be!"

The holy land of the Demonic Path, the ten Demonic Sects.

When they combined their strength, the world came to call them Demon Palace.

And now, in the holy land of all the world’s demons, a Heavenly Demon awakens, ready to devour the martial world.

posts.postTitle: So? Did Someone Force You to Become the Heavenly Demon? [Novel]
posts.postContent:
“Choose. Between dying here or become my disciple.”

Says the old man with his sword already drawn and pointed at my throat.

"One day, a wyvern flew overhead.
The moment I saw it, I decided to retire."

Aster, once a notorious troublemaker from the slums, clawed his way into the esteemed mage family—House Declan.
But craving freedom, he fled… only to be hunted down and killed.

When he opens his eyes again, he's back in the slums, caught in the hazy border between life and death.

"This time, I'm going to build a library—no, a tower! Just like my old comrades dreamed of."
"And for good measure, I’ll display the Declan family’s secret spellbook right on the first floor."

A legendary figure, Demonic God Jeong Cheon, who once brought a storm of blood to the martial world. Just his name alone struck fear across the realms, and his sword could split the very heavens. The elite warriors of the Nine Great Sects, none could stand against him. His unparalleled martial prowess shook the world and became legend, yet in the end, he defied everyone’s expectations and met his death. For a brief moment, the martial world found peace, and the story of the Demonic God seemed destined to fade into myth. “Yet fate would not let him go.” Astonishingly, Demonic God Jeong Cheon returned to life. But this time, not as the great warrior of his past, but in the body of a weak young noble of a fallen clan, tormented by madness. The soul that once commanded the world now found itself trapped within a frail body and endless suffering. The clan’s downfall, the scorn of those around him, and the shadow of madness gnawing at his mind, all of it presses down on his new life.

Twenty years have passed since the Great War, but petty theft and exploitation have taken root during times of peace. The once dazzling world of Murim is a mere shadow of its former self, but one young enigmatic swordsman has sworn to restore Jianghu to its former glory. Will the noble principles of justice and loyalty prevail over corruption and greed?

"The most original union in history—human and ogre blood fused!" Leon, a half-blood born of human and ogre, But returning to the world as a half-breed only meant being used and betrayed by humans. Leon grew to despise them and swore revenge. Powerless and always the victim, Leon’s miracle finally arrived— a chance to take vengeance on humankind.

A legendary figure, Demonic God Jeong Cheon, who once brought a storm of blood to the martial world. Just his name alone struck fear across the realms, and his sword could split the very heavens. The elite warriors of the Nine Great Sects, none could stand against him. His unparalleled martial prowess shook the world and became legend, yet in the end, he defied everyone’s expectations and met his death. For a brief moment, the martial world found peace, and the story of the Demonic God seemed destined to fade into myth. “Yet fate would not let him go.” Astonishingly, Demonic God Jeong Cheon returned to life. But this time, not as the great warrior of his past, but in the body of a weak young noble of a fallen clan, tormented by madness. The soul that once commanded the world now found itself trapped within a frail body and endless suffering. The clan’s downfall, the scorn of those around him, and the shadow of madness gnawing at his mind, all of it presses down on his new life.

The last blacksmith and master artisan left in the world. His hands are crippled in a forge fire, rendering him unable to craft any longer. But then, a virtual reality game, Ares, comes knocking on Hyun-soo’s door.

[Unrepairable Artifact.]

[Cannot be crafted due to level restrictions.]

“Huh? I consider myself a manual blacksmith, though.” For him, no system restrictions apply. The tumultuous game of the genius blacksmith begins.
posts.author: The Genius Blacksmith's Game

posts.postTitle: The Swordmaster Who Leapt Through Time
posts.postContent:
He saves the future by going to the past!

Ransen, the last prince of the Vanroa Kingdom destroyed by the Empire's invasion, sets out for a distant foreign land with the children of his retainers.

Struggling to survive, he eventually becomes a Sword Master at a young age.

But after an unexpected incident, he loses his strength and those around him are put in danger…

To survive, he uses an ancient relic to travel ten thousand years into the past, where he gains a mysterious fortune and returns to the present to overcome the crisis.

Yet the dangers continue to repeat, forcing him into time travel again and again.

Amidst it all, astonishing secrets tied to the present begin to surface one by one.
posts.novelTitle: The Swordmaster Who Leapt Through Time

posts.postTitle: The Tale Of The Skeleton Messenger
posts.postContent: 120 years after the Emperor's death, the Emperor's messenger and Former member of the hero's party, Benrira, awakens. Having lost her beloved student to the corrupt fatherland, She decides to deliver the Emperor's final message. "I am the messenger who delivers the Emperor's words. Heed the will of the First Emperor!"

[By the Studio that brought you <Regressing as the Reincarnated Bastard of the Sword Clan>

The holy land of the Demonic Path, the ten Demonic Sects.

When they combined their strength, the world came to call them Demon Palace.

And now, in the holy land of all the world’s demons, a Heavenly Demon awakens, ready to devour the martial world.
posts.alternativeTitles: 신마대제, The Divine Demon’s Grand Ascension

posts.postTitle: Reborn on the Demonic Cult Battlefield
posts.postContent:
Once the shame of his family, now an overpowered martial arts prodigy with a perfect memory?!

"I died and returned to the front lines, and this time, I'm no longer the pig I used to be!"
posts.alternativeTitles: Demonic Frontline: The Thirteenth Flying Dragon
posts.novelTitle: Demonic Frontline: The Thirteenth Flying Dragon

posts.postTitle: The Rebellious Apostle of the Harvest Goddess
posts.postContent:
“I beat the 0.0000001% odds and became an Apostle serving the [God of Abundance].

It’s clearly some kind of agriculture-related deity… but my starting skill is beheading.

Chop off a head, and farming goes click. Processing crops, also goes click.

Selling a health supplement that’s honestly great, but impossible to explain.
posts.author: 곰산타

posts.postContent:
Do Tong-dal, a sixty-year-old man, is on the verge of death. After dedicating forty-two years of his life to the criminal underworld, all he has left to show for it are fifteen coins.

Having accomplished nothing, he prepares to meet his end, taking his last breath while being buried by snow on a mountain path...

But he regresses in time, and a new life as an eighteen-year-old welcomes him.

‘This life will be different.’

Determined to leave his pathetic past self behind, Do Tong-dal decides to use the knowledge of the life he already lived!

He plans to monopolize every fortunate opportunity and forge a new path for himself.

“From the highest peak of the night, with the greatest power! Let’s live a long and prosperous life!”

posts.postTitle: The Mad Dog of the Duke’s Estate
posts.postContent:
I lived my whole life as a s*ave, bound by a leash. But there was one thing that I was able to choose for myself: the place where I would die.

“…Any last words?”

My only friend asked me in a calm voice, and I quietly replied as I closed my eyes.

“Waaaah!”

…Waaaah?

To cut to the chase, I was reincarnated. And not just as anyone, but as my friend’s youngest grandson. So, what am I going to do now? Well, what else can I do?

“I’m going to cause chaos.”
posts.novelTitle: The Mad Dog of the Duke’s Estate

posts.postTitle: So? Did Someone Force You to Become the Heavenly Demon?
posts.postContent:
A ninth-grade civil servant, Seo Jihoon, only ever wished for a long, quiet, and peaceful life.

But after being fatally stabbed by a violent petitioner, the place where he opened his eyes again was none other than a martial world where martial arts truly existed.

Even there, he only wanted to live quietly…

Until he encountered the one man he should never have crossed paths with.

“Choose. Die here, or become my disciple.”

An old man who pressed a blade to his throat without warning.

His true identity, the cult leader of the Heavenly Demon Sect.

Thinking survival comes first before anything else, Seo Jihoon had no choice but to become part of the Heavenly Demon.

Once a capable public servant, he grew into an unrivaled talent within the sect, armed with powerful martial arts and sharp intellect

But why does the work keep piling up? Why does he keep getting promoted?!

His original goal was simply a peaceful life, yet somehow, his second life is racing down the path of the Heavenly Demon.

Will he ever be able to find the life he truly desires in this world?
posts.novelTitle: So? Did Someone Force You to Become the Heavenly Demon?

posts.postContent:
Being reincarnated in a cultivation world, Han Jue realizes that he can live his life like a video game. He can reroll his cultivation potential and connate providence.

So, he spends 11 years rerolling for a good one…

[Unparalleled: Immortal beauty, top-notch charm]

[Destined Sword fanatic: Top-notch Sword Dao aptitude, top-notch Sword Dao comprehension]

[Unparalleled Movement Technique: Top-notch movement technique aptitude]

[Descendant of the Immortal Emperor: You will receive an unparalleled cultivation technique and 1,000 superior-grade spirit stones]

In pursuit of longevity, Han Jue decides to cultivate in a low-profile manner.
A thousand years later, generations of cultivators have become history.

That is when beings of the fairyland start cleansing the mortal world. Han Jue can no longer hide and has no choice but to take action.

Then he realizes, that deities and gods aren’t that powerful after all!
posts.author: Xing Kong (星空社)

posts.postContent: Regret is the bane of old men. When aging Alliance Lord Hajin Cheon of the Grand Martial Alliance reflects on his immense legacy, he finds that he recalls little of his deeds or even the lives of his closest advisors. Stricken by a mysterious ailment, Hajin suddenly passes away only to wake up in the body of Ridan Byeok, heir to the Byeok Clan of swordsmen. The only problem is, Ridan is a well-known wastrel, the polar opposite of the virtuous and stern Hajin. Righting the wrongs of his predecessor, Hajin begins to uncover the truth behind his death…
posts.alternativeTitles: 한국어 (韓國語), 조선말 (朝鮮語) Reincarnated Murim Lord
posts.author: JP, Younghoon Jang

posts.postTitle: A Mountain of Corpses, A Sea of Blood
posts.postContent: 1. The climactic war between humanity and the demon race ends with the strongest hero, Gron, dying alongside the Demon Emperor. Five years later, Gron awakens within the demons' camp, only to discover his soul has transmigrated into the body of the weakest demon. Unexpectedly, his human soul awakens a hidden power within the body: the ancient Serpent God's power of evolution. Gron, once famous for his extreme sense of justice, will now use this demonic body to unleash a bloody storm.

posts.postTitle: The Marquis’ Ducal Son is a Martial Artist
posts.postContent: In a fantasy world within a novel, I alone can wield martial arts.
posts.novelTitle: The Marquis’ Ducal Son is a Martial Artist

posts.postContent:
While playing the remake of his favorite game, <Knight Saga: RE>, Joo Ingong is suddenly pulled into the game itself.

But something is off.
In Knight Saga: RE, the playable characters are supposed to be Locke from the Human Faction and Zephyr from the Demon Realm.
Yet when he opens his eyes, the body he inhabits isn’t either of them—it’s Shutra, the inconspicuous ninth prince of the Demon Realm.

In this inexplicable situation, Joo Ingong is granted mysterious powers: the Protagonist Buff and the Power of Conquest.

To survive against Zephyr, the Demon Realm’s “hero,” Joo Ingong begins to alter the course of the game as Shutra.

And the more he changes the story, the more attention falls on the once-useless ninth prince…
posts.author: Chwiryong

posts.postContent: Rudd’s a nobody-- just an E-Rank adventurer with a seemingly useless talent of status immunity. An outcast in a city obsessed with labyrinth crawling, he’s stuck scraping by as a “grubby forager,” navigating guild politics and backstabbing adventurers just to survive. But when a betrayal leaves him for dead without any supplies or help, he does the unthinkable and consumes the flesh of fallen monsters...

posts.postTitle: Savior of Divine Blood: Draw Out 0.00000001% to Become the Strongest
posts.postContent: A player who can fight creatures from the wonders of another world. The main protagonist, Ariake Subaru, was bullied and was chosen as a player of the “Rainbow” rank, which is neither gold, silver, nor copper. He acquired the skill to freely manipulate blood, and his life and position changed completely. As he continues to fight every day, he gradually earns the title as a “Savior” who will save the world.

Tang Mujin, the young physician of the Tang Family Clinic in Sichuan, had a strange dream.

He dreamt of becoming the legendary master blacksmith Ou Yezi, and ascending to immortality.

Twenty years have passed since the Great War, but petty theft and exploitation have taken root during times of peace. The once dazzling world of Murim is a mere shadow of its former self, but one young enigmatic swordsman has sworn to restore Jianghu to its former glory. Will the noble principles of justice and loyalty prevail over corruption and greed?
posts.author: Younghoon Jang

posts.postContent:
Gangster Hong Dojin.

Using the power of a demon to carry out revenge.

"One day, a wyvern flew overhead.
The moment I saw it, I decided to retire."

Aster, once a notorious troublemaker from the slums, clawed his way into the esteemed mage family—House Declan.
But craving freedom, he fled… only to be hunted down and killed.

When he opens his eyes again, he's back in the slums, caught in the hazy border between life and death.

"This time, I'm going to build a library—no, a tower! Just like my old comrades dreamed of."
"And for good measure, I’ll display the Declan family’s secret spellbook right on the first floor."

posts.postTitle: Barbarian’s Adventure in a Fantasy World
posts.postContent:
Every night, he prayed to every god in existence:

Please, when I wake tomorrow, let me find myself in the middle of a fantasy.

One day, that long-cherished prayer was answered—
just not in the way he had hoped.

He awoke to a blindingly white world, a snow-covered land of frost and silence… as a Barbarian.

The term “Barbarian” was unfamiliar to him,
but overwhelmed with awe at having entered a fantasy realm, he became eager to learn more about the world he had dreamed of for so long.

Unlike ordinary barbarians, he earnestly studied the human language and accumulated knowledge to better understand this new world, even earning a legal mercenary license.

However, his fearsome appearance and immense strength constantly led to one misunderstanding after another…
posts.author: 파란영
posts.novelTitle: Barbarian’s Adventure in a Fantasy World

posts.postContent:
A deceased S-rank hunter builds a house inside the gate and lives there.

He raises monsters and cultivates demonic plants. This time, he wants to live life on his own terms.
posts.alternativeTitles: The S-Class Hunter’s Peaceful Life with Monsters, 몬스터와 힐링하는 S급 헌터

posts.postContent:
A deceased S-rank hunter builds a house inside the gate and lives there.

He raises monsters and cultivates demonic plants. This time, he wants to live life on his own terms.

A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.
___
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alternative Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (US Only)
posts.alternativeTitles: 日本語 (にほんご／にっぽんご)
posts.author: Kei Urana

posts.postContent: The protagonist, a dedicated player of the RPG "Dragon Slayer Academy", had raised an astounding 1000 heroes to S-rank as the game's strongest support character. But one day, a mysterious quest window appears before him, offering a hidden quest, the chance to raise a hero beyond S-Rank, an EX-Rank. The moment he accepts, he finds himself reincarnated inside the game world of "Dragon Slayer Academy"…

[By the same Author that brought you Return of the Mount Hua Sect!]

The great martial artist who ended the chaos of the world. The Shining Supreme Martial Artist, Wi Yeonho. He was a true gentleman, a great man, and a noble hero... "That guy? He was a total piece of trash." A truth too shameful to be revealed to the world. The true nature of the so-called greatest hero of all time is finally exposed!

"You criminal bastard… Can't you get your head straight?!"

All I did was start the final difficulty level
of the game “Abyss of the Labyrinth”,
and I ended up becoming a character in the game —
an "Otherworld Possessor."

But worse, the character I became
is a criminal turned slave?!

However, every time I face a crisis,
a magical ability called “Turn-Bound Hourglass” activates,
freezing time for 60 seconds...

I don’t know if it was the developer or some god
that threw me into this mess,

But as a turn-Bounded mage,
I will survive — no matter what.

[By the Studio that brought you <Surviving The Game as a Barbarian> and <The Player Hides His Past>, and many more>!}

The Central Plains fell under the invasion of the Demon Realm.
A warrior, Sabi-gang, was ultimately dragged into the Demon Realm itself.
Surviving countless brushes with death and hellish torment, he returns—ten years before the invasion.

To stop the coming onslaught,
Sabi-gang sets out to restore order in the martial world
and begins building an ‘Undefeated Legion.’

The one who will change the past and protect the future—
this time, he will never be defeated.

Money maniac Fernan Pellenberg is the young heir of House Pellenberg, one of the Empire’s most prestigious houses, and a top student at the Imperial Academy. However, he’s infamous for something else: his obsession with money. As a ruthless money-hound, he only acknowledges those who bring him profit and views everything in the world through the lens of monetary value. People avoid him, finding his greed repulsive.

But was divine punishment finally upon him?

One day, out of nowhere, disaster strikes Fernan like a bolt from the blue. As his consciousness begins to fade, something attempts to invade and take over his mind, but Fernan forcefully expels it instead.

From that moment on, he begins to see something strange: a prophetic book that reveals the future. And not just any future, but a prophecy of the end of the world.

Paris, 2014. The call from Michelin rings through the renowned French restaurant Escopille, sending waves of anxiety through its owner-chef, Natsuki Obana. As he braces for the results, he gives his trusted waiter Kyono Rikutaro an impossible mission: “Bring me a pastry chef worthy of three Michelin stars—immediately.” With no time to lose, Kyono sets off through the bustling streets of Paris in search of a prodigy. Along the way, he reunites with Ichika, the very woman who once inspired him to study culinary arts in France. Rekindling both nostalgia and ambition, Kyono finds himself reawakened to the passion for cooking he had long set aside. Soon, his journey leads him to a brilliant young pâtissier—Yuan—whose talent may be the missing piece to Natsuki’s dream. As the destinies of these three intertwine in the competitive and romantic heart of French cuisine, their story unfolds with tension, taste, and transformation.

posts.postTitle: Return of the Apocalypse-Class Death Knight
posts.postContent:
A Death Knight who killed his family and brought about the fall of humanity…

is given a chance to return to the past and correct his sins.

[Return of the Apocalypse-Class Death Knight]

Damian Haksen, a man born with unmatched talent that would go down in history,

was forcefully turned into a Death Knight and enslaved by the Archlich.

Under the Archlich’s control, he ends up slaughtering his own family

and destroying all the kingdoms.

He regained his sanity at the very last moment—

but by then, it was far too late.

Just as he was about to give up on everything, a miracle occurred—

Regression.

Now, having returned to the time before it all began,

his goal is crystal clear:

This time… I’ll live only for the happiness and future of my family.

Of course…

After thoroughly hunting down the vile black mages

and making them taste the true meaning of hell!

[By Redice Studio that brought you <Solo Leveling> and <Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint> and <Revenge of the Iron-Blooded Sword Hound, and many more!> ]


Han Jaewoo is a sweat in the world-famous game "Savior Of Humanity."

Once a hardcore player, now drowning in debt in his tiny room.

His long-awaited showdown with a demon lord ends in an unexpected failure.

The debt collectors are closing in... and all that's left to him are despair and stubborn grit.

That's when Aquila, the administrator, appears with an offer:

"Don't you want to see it? The true happy ending of this game..."

With a prize of 25 million dollars on the line, and the path to the true ending finally revealed, he accepts it.

However, there's a catch:

He's thrown back into the game world with all his stats reduced to rock bottom.

"Thanks for the "realism," Aquilla...

Screw it. I'm clearing this damn thing!"
posts.alternativeTitles: 피도 눈물도 없는 용사, Hero Without Blood or Tear

posts.postContent: Those who can draw a Mind Sword are called "Warriors." Ellon sets off on a journey to become one, but the warriors he dreamed of turn out to be nothing more than brutal killing machines. Will Ellon overcome this harsh reality and become a true warrior?

posts.postTitle: The Great Mage Returns After 4000 Years
posts.postContent: Lucas Trowman was the greatest archmage in history until he was condemned by Demigod to spend eternity losing his mind. But 4,000 years later, he’s thrust back into this world, into the body of Frei Blake, the weakest, most un-talented student at the prestigious Westroad Academy for mages. After all this time, the world of magic has barely progressed. Could this be the work of Demigod? Determined to find out, Lucas seeks to reach the highest levels of power once again and get his revenge.
posts.author: Nakhasan (낙하산), Barnicle (따개비)

posts.postContent:
Devoid of any talent, I met my end after suffering at rock bottom for many years.

That was my first life... and the start of my endless regressions.
posts.author: Eum Chung-Nan

posts.postTitle: Rise of the Fallen Kingdom's Third Prince
posts.postContent:
[By the Studio that brought you <The Legendary Hero is an Academy Honors Student>

Briol Does Not Abandon Honor.

Yuri, the notorious third prince of the Kingdom of Briol, is the only one to escape with his life at the kingdom’s final, catastrophic end.

Consumed by regret and guilt, Yuri eventually meets his death…

Only to open his eyes and see a familiar face—his father’s?

He thinks the king and prince have ended up in hell together.

“Father… Have you finally fallen into hell as well?”

“What?”

“Well, considering how you always preached about honor, your life was quite the indulgent one…”

“What nonsense are you spouting?!”

But this isn't hell—

He’s returned to the spring of his 13th year?!

One devastating regret is enough.

This time, he will save the kingdom from ruin!

A disastrous beginning—god-tier progression!

The protagonist, a jobless man barely scraping by with part-time gigs, lives like a drifting orphan.

His only escape from a dull, unchanging life is the online game God-Forsaken World. To him, it’s not just entertainment—it’s his lifeline.

But one day, while immersed in the game, a mysterious voice echoes in his ears.
When he comes to... he’s no longer at his desk—he’s in the world of the game!

You’d think being pulled into a fantasy world means becoming a powerful, heroic figure.
Instead, he wakes up as the Empire’s disgrace: the failed third prince, Gilroshan Elro de Valt.

And to top it off, he opens his eyes at the very moment someone’s trying to kill him.

Now trapped in the body of a fat, cowardly prince hated by all, he has only one advantage—
a strategy guide.
A lifeline only a seasoned player like him could possess. The key to surviving this brutal new reality.

Alongside his stumbling body, a fiercely loyal knight named Carls, and a fearsome but dependable mage mentor Tirvaen, a new adventure begins—one more unforgiving than any game.

“Survive in the body of a good-for-nothing prince? Easier said than done.”

Get ready for an unpredictable fantasy packed with humor, fierce battles, and relentless survival action!

A strange door appeared in front of lawyer Han Beomsang.

Beyond it lies a space where time does not flow.

posts.postTitle: The Sword God From a Fallen World
posts.postContent:
The world has ended.
A realm consumed by death and despair.

And the man who fought until the very end—the Sword God, Karserian Le Vandein.

But as if guided by fate, a door to another world opened.
Beyond it lay Earth, still pristine, untouched by ruin.

Yet there, monsters have begun to appear, and humanity lives unaware of the looming calamity.

This world is not yet lost.
However, the dreadful events of the past will repeat themselves—unless someone stops them.

To prevent that future, the Sword God raises his blade once more.

Borrowing the body of a frail human, he begins a new life.
In return, he makes a single vow:

"I will protect your family."

And now, the true story begins.
posts.alternativeTitles: The Sword God From the Destroyed World, The Sword God From a Ruined World

posts.postContent:
Everything in this world is ranked.

Low, a boy from Tully Village,

loses his home one day to an entity known as the "Island of the Gods."

Why did the village disappear? Why were they targeted?

To uncover the truth, Low makes a resolution: he will go to the Island of the Gods himself!

However, to reach the Island of the Gods, he must first rank within the top 10 of the Adventurer Ranking.

To achieve his goal, Low trains under Adol, the #1 ranked Knight, and embarks on a new journey.

"I will definitely become the #1 Ranker and uncover the truth."

Jang Suchan is an extraordinary college student at the top of the social food chain. But underneath the perfect façade, he hides a pair of insect wings that suddenly grew when he used a mysterious bug spray called "Jungle Juice.” Suchan's life crumbles when he bares his wings to the world to save someone's life. When all hope seems lost, Suchan stumbles upon a hidden world of insect humans where everyone is accepted for what they are.

But the law of the jungle governs this secret society and all must fend for themselves in order to survive.
posts.author: Youn In-Wan

posts.postContent:
Kang Chul-ho, the strongest man who was summoned to another world and defeated the Demon King after a fierce battle, finally returns to Earth after 30 years.
But the world he once knew has changed—Earth is now in the era of monster raids.
Exhausted from a lifetime of fighting, Kang Chul-ho no longer wishes to pick up a weapon.
Instead, he chooses to pursue his long-forgotten dream: opening a restaurant and living a quiet, peaceful life.
This is the story of his encounters with the guests who visit his diner—and the unique tales they bring with them.

Shin Youngwoo (aka Grid), an unlucky man in life and a low-level player in the popular VR game Satisfy, finds a powerful item that earns him a rare legendary class title: Pagma’s Successor. Now a skilled blacksmith, he can forge unique weapons and equip the game’s most powerful gear!

Grid resolves to use his new abilities to achieve fame and fortune, but as his very existence begins to stir up trouble in Satisfy, he realizes that life as a legend may be more than he bargained for….
posts.author: Saenal (박새날), Monohumbug (이동욱)

posts.postContent: Having lost his ranked account to a hacker, Kang Yoohan wants to get even. Assuming his lost equipment was sold, he’s hoping that as blacksmith Zig, it will come back to him through repairs and lead him to the hacker. After breaking many swords, however, he finds this is no walk in the park. Thankfully, he’s able to see cracks in the equipment and enemies that show their vital points to make or break them! Armed with these skills, Zig is looking to get things shaking, or rather, smithing!
posts.author: Next Level Studio, Kang Chan

posts.postContent:
When Seo Junho and his companions sacrificed themselves to defeat the Frost Queen, they thought they were restoring peace to Earth. But after 25 years of being frozen solid, Junho thaws out only to find that nine more floors appeared in his absence, only one of which has been cleared!

As the only one who holds the key to clearing the next floor and defrosting his friends, Junho must step up once again. But has this hero been in hibernation too long to take on the world’s fearsome new foes?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%96%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%B6%99%EC%9D%80-%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4%EC%9D%98-%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98/2463)
---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%97%87%E5%A4%9C%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%E7%A0%B4%E5%86%B0%E8%80%8C%E5%87%BA/176)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.podoteng.com/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/79447)
posts.author: JerryM (제리엠)

posts.postContent:
Would you like to reverse time?]
[All your abilities will be reset.]
[Please choose the date.]

“February 28th, 1985. The day I was born.”

Financial power. I will gather all the fortune of the world—
and create a monopoly. I will monopolize all the dungeons of the world.

I will do this now, while the world is still peaceful...
before it all begins.

**Original Webtoon:**
[Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%84%EC%83%9D%EC%9E%90/3130), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60754076) 

**Official Translations:**
[Simplified Chinese](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26392&contentId=392&platform=IA), [Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/134347)
posts.author: Na Min Chae, NFToon (JANG)

posts.postContent:
A crossover between the +99 Reinforced Wooden Stick and Hardcore Leveling Warrior universes!

I logged into a viral virtual reality game and was given... a weird shovel.

It can create anything, but monsters only attack me.

After smashing everything with the shovel, strange people started to appear!

Who will win? Let's find out in a fight!

The legend of the killer organization, Cha Si-hyuk.

After meeting the woman he loves, he decides to retire, but his company has no intention of letting him go so easily.

In the end, they begin to take everything from him, and Cha Si-hyuk takes up the knife once again.

Revenge begins, and he is inevitably pulled into a war with the massive organization ‘Nevilga’…

At the end of his path of revenge, what will be left?

[Activating unique trait: "Skill Master (EX)"]

> Activating "Skill Copy (EX)."

"Whoa, that skill's amazing!"

[Copy complete.]

There's no skill he can't obtain.

Your skills are mine! My skills are mine!

The brilliant journey of the All Skill Master, Jooyeon, begins now!

This is the first side story of Tower Of God.

"Urek Mazino," who entered the Tower chasing after Phantaminum.

This is the story of his time as a Regular.

posts.postTitle: Top Delinquent of the Demonic Sect
posts.postContent:
Hey, I’m Gucheon (The Highest Sky), the strongest of the Demonic Cult. Anyone know how to get back to the Cult?

Gucheon, the absolute being who trampled the martial world and ruled at the very top.

He was the one who led the Demonic Cult to its peak, and to the righteous sects, he was called the Heavenly Demon.

The final war against the Demonic Sect, launched by the combined forces of all sects, including the Nine Great Sects.

After a fierce battle, Gucheon was killed by an unknown entity.

Just when he thought everything was over...

He opened his eyes , not in Jianghu, but inside a weak body in the modern era?!

"What the...?! Where is this crazy place?! Send me back!!"

Gucheon descends upon the modern world...!!!

"Here, try this sword."

Junseo Shin is a master weapon creator doing menial jobs to keep a low profile in a world teeming with monster dungeons. But his habit of lending weapons to those in need exposes him to mega guilds and covert figures out to kill budding heroes from his past life. 

Can Junseo craft his way out of trouble and uncover the conspiracy that followed him to this life?
posts.author: Seo Tae-Rang

posts.postContent: Betrayed by his guild and defeated by a top player, Hyrkan loses everything. Before he can get revenge, a fatal accident ends his life—only for him to wake up years in the past, back at the start of Warlord. Now, with his memories intact, he’s determined to rise to the top alone. But in a game where power means everything, can he truly survive without any allies? The Emperor of Solo Play is back, and this time, he’s playing by his own rules.
posts.author: silvering26

posts.postTitle: The Dark Mage ~ I am the Only Transcendant Mage who Regressed with Cheat Skills
posts.postContent:
<Dungeons> suddenly appeared around the world, resulting in the awakening of humans. Those who possess skills are called [Colored], meanwhile those who are excellent are granted the title of <Mage>.

Kurosaki Rei, who has no skills, is discriminated and called <Colorless>.

Compared to him, his brother who is recognized as the <Purple King>. Regardless, Rei couldn't give up his dream to become a <Mage>.

10 years after the first appearance of the the <Dungeons>, a powerful entity emerged and threatened to destroy the whole world. The entity is known as the <God of time and space>. Against the overwhelming power of the god, Rei had awakened a skill called <Skill Drain>, and then stole the power of the god....!

Using this new power, he gained the power to fight against the time itself and flew into the past to start over everything.

[By the Studio that brought you <The Legend of the Northern Blade>
“I was abandoned in this damned world?!” Chronicles of the World of Seven Hues. A series that went on for more than 800 chapters, receiving no shortage of insults from it's readers. A world of madness, filled with all sorts of nonsense mechanics, monsters that scale endlessly, and girls that will try to kill the main character on a single whim. And I just entered this world alone?! Now, having become some extra called Ludian, I've decided to take over this world with the help of Adi, an eyeball monster I ran into, and the demon sword, Diablo. Let's show them how a crazy player really acts!

posts.postTitle: I Became the Leader of a Doomed Girl Group
The Monster Knight Wants Parental Leave

posts.postContent:
Shoya Ohno, a tank affiliated with the Japan Hunter Administration Bureau, is a man shrouded in mystery.

He was drawn to the straightforward personality of Eda, the director of the Bureau, and despite receiving an extraordinary offer from the United States, he turned it down to continue operating in Japan for his own personal reasons.

In truth, Shoya is a survivor who, ten years ago, was abducted to the otherworldly continent of Azelan. Despite enduring unimaginable suffering, he managed to return to Earth alive.

To protect the Earth and to rescue his friends who were abducted just like he was—

Shoya continues to fight.

And once that goal is fulfilled...

He will rise to confront the continent of Azelan, which seeks to annihilate humanity on Earth through its gate invasions.

Thus, Shoya sets his plan into motion.

posts.postTitle: The Hunter Lives in a Rented Apartment
posts.postContent: Ten years ago, on the day of the First Greater Rift, Jiho lost his father, who was a firefighter. One day, while preparing for the Hunter Association exam, Jiho's life changes when a sudden crack occurs.

posts.postTitle: I Became the Genius Bastard of a Noble Dark Clan
posts.postContent: After breaking his back working with the Hero's Party, Chris wound up facing a dog's death. 'Please, let me be born into a wealthy family in my next life…' When he next awoke, he was the young master of an immensely wealthy family. However, he wasn't just any noble son but Christian van Baren Kazar—the infamous, good-for-nothing bastard of the Magic Empire's Dark Magic Clan. "Aaaagh! What the hell?!" There were only two years left until Christian was fated to meet an untimely death. And even if he managed to survive that long, he still needed to stop the end of the world. Chris had only one option if he wanted to survive and enjoy a life of wealth and luxury: seize control of the Dark Magic Clan and become a Demon King himself. Though the odds were stacked against him, it seemed doable enough. Why? 'Because I'm a genius!'

[By the Author and Studio that brought you <Hardcore Leveling Warrior: Earth Game!]

The Great Yokai must be defeated!

???: But I'm only 8 years old?

The adorable Priestess Se-ah and the gloomy Exorcist Shiho star in this Exorcism Shonen Manga!

"Jae-hee, why do you always carry two scripts?"

"Well, I might lose one."

That's a lie.

One is for carrying around on set and showing off to others.

The other is...

[The drama 'Youth Train' is available for absorption.]

[Would you like to absorb it?]

I use it for consumption.

I devour the script, making it entirely my own.

The story of Jae-hee, an actor who can absorb 100% of a script.

Junwon, a perfect man, and Ju-i, a woman who knows her abilities and charms, strike an unusual deal: they will date with one strict condition—no falling in love. What starts as a simple arrangement soon becomes complicated as unexpected feelings begin to surface. Can they stick to their promise, or will emotions get the better of them? Dive into a world where love is both the goal and the enemy, and find out if their hearts will follow the rules or break free.

posts.postTitle: I'm a Villainess, but I Won't Live Like One
posts.postContent: Bianca is just another noble lady with a simple dream: to marry into a dukedom and enjoy a life of luxury. But everything changes when she stumbles upon a book—one that casts her as the villainess, doomed to stand in the way of her real-life fiancé’s love story with a commoner girl. As Bianca realizes the book accurately depicts her own fate, she refuses to accept her tragic ending. Can she rewrite her story, or is she simply destined to become a villainess?

posts.postTitle: The Knight Becomes a Black Flower

posts.postContent:
[By the same author brought you {The Heavenly Demon Can't Live a Normal Life}!]

Kang San is a bottom 1% tanker with no talent, abilities, or skill. Misfortune follows him until a divine messenger appears before him one day.

“You were the Blood Demon in your past life.”

To atone for his past life's sins, he must endure harsh trials. But in return, he will receive immense rewards?

“Fine. I’ll do whatever it takes.”

Can a weak F-rank tanker drenched in blood change his fate?

“Death is only the beginning.” Truer words were never spoken for young Leon von Marbas, the heir to a once-great house of necromancers. Forced to execute his own father by the lord of a rival house, Leon suddenly finds himself the leader of a declining clan under threat from enemies within and without. The only way to restore the glory of his house? Leon must strike a pact with the demon Marbas, the original source of the powerful necromancy that House Marbas was once known for…
posts.author: Jung seonyul

posts.postContent:
Three years ago, doomsday prepper named Park Kyu predicted the world’s end and prepared for it in every way possible. As he expected, one day, a nuclear attack on Seoul led to a global nuclear war, resulting in an unprecedented apocalypse.

Despite everyone’s ridicule, Park Kyu spent his entire fortune over the past three years to quietly dig out his own bunker. Was it merely a coincidence that he foresaw all these events?
posts.author: Dd, Road Warrior

posts.postContent: After a night of drinking, aspiring civil servant Ryu Gunwoo passes out, only to awaken three years in the past in the body of a young man named Park Moondae. Before he can even assess the situation, he's given a mission: Debut or Die! Now, Moondae has one year to debut as an idol or face his doom. Luckily, he's able to snag a spot on the famous survival program "Idol Inc.," but with his skills so low and the competition so high, does Moondae stand a chance at becoming a shining star?
posts.author: Baek Deoksoo

posts.postTitle: A Spy’s Survival in the Demonic Cult
posts.postContent:
A spy from the Murim Alliance who infiltrated the Demonic Cult, Jang Yiseo.
He was given his first and last mission.

That mission was… to make the infamous scoundrel, the Seventh Young Master, Ma Oh, the next cult successor!

The story begins with the meeting of Jang Yiseo, a man with genius-level martial talent but limited by his physical constitution, and Ma Oh, an exceptionally gifted yet somewhat eccentric individual…!

Will Jang Yiseo and Ma Oh be able to rise to the position of one just below the cult leader, yet above all others in the Demonic Cult’s world domination?
posts.author: DAE Eunho

posts.postContent: Webtoon series based on the game "Solo Leveling: Arise", this spin-off is set around the original series and is focused on various characters.
posts.author: Chugong (추공)

chapters.title: Hunter: Origin Pure Sword Princess Cha Hae-In's Story

posts.postContent: The Hellish Romantic Adventure of Apprentice Angel Yu Dante.
posts.author: Baek Jun-young

posts.postTitle: The Legendary Hero is an Academy Honors Student
posts.postContent:
I am a great hero, so why am I the only one not recorded in the annals of history?

Back in the Age of Despair, Kyle defeated Erebos, the genesis of evil.

Then 5000 years later, he reincarnated as Leo with the memories of his past life intact.

His comrades—The Brave Arron, The Divine Blacksmitsh Dweno, The Poet of the Stars Luna, and The Wise King Lysinas—were all heralded as great heroes.

But the 'Hero Record', a gift from the heavens that records the achievements of heroes through the ages, had no record of Kyle whatsoever, and the people of the present treat him like a fictional character.

Angry about the reality he's found himself in, Leo enrolls at Lumene Academy, the hero academy which houses the Hero Record.

"Fine. I guess I'll become an honors student to figure out why I was written out of history."
posts.author: Yerona

posts.postContent: ‘How long have i been laying down at home…?’ Han Jia, who is turning 32 this year (she’s a freelancer who’s still doesn’t have a full-time job/jobless), suffers because of the pressure given by people around her that keep telling her to get married. Around the same time, Jin Mincheol, her childhood friend who came to Jia’s hometown for holiday, is having the same problem. Then, the two people got married just like that. Now that they have married….. ‘Huh? We match each other more than i thought?’
posts.author: Honey Skein (꿀타래)

posts.postTitle: I Am in the Same Class as the Crazy Male Leads
posts.postContent:
On a day when my luck seemed to hit rock bottom, I got hit by a truck, and when I opened my eyes, I found myself inside the ridiculous novel I wrote back in high school.

A novel filled with nothing but abnormal male leads!

Kang Seonwoo, who appears to be a model student with perfect manners, but is actually a psychopath. 

Cha Yihan, who looks like a delinquent, but is actually a clingy, puppy-like guy with a severe love deficiency– especially when it comes to the female lead.

And Kim Chanseung, a promising national swimmer, but also the female lead’s stalker!

“What on earth was high school me thinking when I wrote this?!”

I must live quietly and avoid getting involved with these lunatics to the best of my ability!

But as they say, life never goes as planned…

“If there’s something you don’t like, just tell me. I want to get closer to you.”
Starting with the psychopath’s friend request,

“You say you’re conservative, but isn’t it weird how close you are to those boys?” 
Then, misplaced jealousy from the obsessive guy,

“Here. Eat this.” 
And finally, protein-flirting from the national stalker…

What the heck?! Why are they all acting like this toward me?!

Can I… even survive here…?

For 20 years, actress Seo Kang was tormented by horrific nightmares. In every dream, a man named Han San would save her. One day, he steps out of her dreams and into reality as her personal bodyguard. Who is this mysterious man?
posts.author: Falvi

posts.postTitle: The Day the Real One Appeared
posts.postContent:
"Mel Solfi" an orphan of common birth, suffered from a fever as a child that turned her hair completely white. She was abandoned due to her parents' immense debts and was eventually taken in by Norma.

One day, the Duke of Heaven, who was devastated by the loss of his youngest daughter, mistakes Mel to be his own daughter, "Bleria Charlotte Heaven," due to their similar hair color.

However, the Duke's desperate actions caused a stir in the village, and to cover up his tracks, the young Duke intervened. Damian Jeremiah Heaven, the young duke, ordered Mel to pretend to be his sister, Bleria, to prevent rumors of his father's madness.

Thus, living as Bleria, Mel began to prepare for her engagement to Goper Isaac Alnaight, a noble of the Alnaight Dukedom...

posts.postTitle: The Genius Wants to be Ordinary!
posts.postContent:
The protagonist of a successful life recognized by the public, 'Son Jinhyuk.'
However, Jinhyuk just wanted to live a normal life with his beloved family, and he couldn't hide his lonely heart because he couldn't.
One day, I woke up in an accident and was back to the time I was 9 years old before I lost my parents, whom I wanted so much!
Will Jinhyuk be able to save his parents and live a normal life?

posts.postTitle: How To Reject My Obsessive Ex-Husband
posts.postContent: When Yu Seohyeon sacrificed her life to save her first love, Ciel de Leopart, she never expected to wake up as Irene de Closhe in a world straight out of a book. Amidst this bizarre twist, she reunites with Ciel, who has now become a supporting male lead destined to betray the crown prince. As her unique guide abilities resurface, Seohyeon is haunted by Ciel’s intense, madness-filled gaze, a stark contrast to the man she once knew. Tangled in a web of past love and new identities, Seohyeon must navigate a treacherous path where past and present collide.
posts.author: Pinkrim

posts.postTitle: How to Be a Dark Hero's Daughter
posts.postContent: The MC transmigrated into a novel and became an extra from the novel. The novel is a murder thriller and the main character is a serial killer. He kills criminals with black magic making him a dark hero (think of him as Dexter or batman with dark magic). She (MC) doesn't have any death flags since she’s a background extra but she was a homeless girl of all things in such a dangerous novel. Somehow our MC saves the male lead and to thank her, he adopts her. “Become my daughter.” The richest, most powerful, and handsome duke asks her to be his child. The MC is freaked out since she knows he’s a cold blooded killer. Can she survive such a maniac? Yet he dotes on her and constantly says ‘my daughter is the cutest’! He wants to get master artists to draw her and gather poets to describe her adorableness. The duke also has a son. The apple doesn’t fall far from the tree; he also dotes on her. In this way, a beggar became a little princess. She also got used to people getting killed. However there was still one problem. Our MC has turned sixteen and is wondering as a lady, will she have an arranged marriage? The whole house atmosphere quickly turns awkward. She realizes, perhaps they want her to stay here forever? Can she escape such a strange house? Everyone is so attached to her! --- Duke Kallen de Lewelton is bloodthirsty and ruthless when it comes to killing criminals, but a total sucker when it comes to his new daughter! Peasant girl Lae learns this herself when a fateful run-in with the duke results in her adoption into the Lewelton home. Armed with a sharp mind and the knowledge from her past life, Lae makes the perfect addition to the family’s quest to quell injustice. But as the mysteries of the capital’s underbelly rise to the surface, will she and her new family withstand the return of a true criminal mastermind?
posts.author: Lisabel, Gomdal

posts.postContent:
Lu Jie woke up in a world filled with scheming sects, arrogant young masters, and the mad chase for the immortal heavens. He wanted none of it. But his plan to escape the sect is interrupted by an old Alchemist's pills that heal him within moments—a magical cure. These medicines ignite the flame of curiosity to learn true magic in him, rekindling his love of discovery. Lu Jie sets out to study the immutable truths hidden within the world, and soon finds an all-new path of cultivation that could take him to the very top.

Art by Kisai Entertainment
posts.author: AETHON

posts.postContent: In a world ruled by Writers, a chosen few who draw incredible power from their books, we follow Ji-Sung, an underdog E-rank Writer. His life changes forever as he discovers he’s the secret heir of a legendary Writer and possesses extraordinary abilities. Now hunted for his new powers, Ji-Sung must unlock the truth about his legacy and face fearsome new enemies.
posts.author: Jeffon

posts.postContent: Che is just a human in a world full of superpowered "Kimyos", but he's determined to become the greatest fighter to ever live. When his beloved mentor is murdered, Che swears vengeance and embarks on a mission to unmask the killer. But soon Che learns that the world of Kimyos is much larger than he ever imagined, and that he himself might be one -- the most powerful Kimyo on Earth, with the power of the sun itself. Will Che be able to harness his new strength, or will he burn up in the heat of this ordeal?
posts.author: Brent Bristol

posts.postContent:
By the studio that brought you {Solo Leveling with Redice studio}!, and brought you {Mr Devourer, Please Act Like a Final Boss}! and {A Returner's Magic Should Be Special} and {Martial God Regressed to Level 2}!
The moment the company receives notice of a person subject to restructuring, With a roaring sound as if the sky had collapsed. And the world has changed. [The sale of this district has been decided.] [This will result in a workforce restructuring.] Restructuring for Lives Missions that you can capture to gain special powers If it's a miraculous prank, I'll do my best for it! "I found it. A way to live together." Restructuring candidate Lee Eunho's super-fast promotion starts now!
posts.alternativeTitles: Cómo sobrevivir a una reestructuración Survive a Restructuring 구조 조정에서 살아남는 법

posts.postContent:
High school student Li Huowang possesses an ability: whenever he closes his eyes, he enters a bizarre cultivation world. In that strange world, he is captured by someone who calls him "Master" and is made into a living medicine—a human cauldron that could be turned into a pill at any moment.

In the real world, however, Li Huowang is a mentally ill patient living in a psychiatric hospital, unable to attend school. The doctors tell him that the bizarre cultivation world is nothing but a hallucination.

Now, caught between reality and illusion, truth and lies, Li Huowang breaks down, crying and shouting:
"Mom, I really can’t tell what’s real anymore!"

[By the studio that brought you <Genius Corpse-Collecting Warrior>!] 
Humanity has been designated as a disruptive species to the cosmic ecosystem.
A survival game, initiated by the cosmic overseers, begins to reduce humanity's population. At the final stage, Jae-hee, a regressed player, reaches a conclusion.
Only Kang Sion can lead this game to victory. A genius with exceptional intellect, Kang Sion, a regressor who lost in the previous game, unravels the death game with overwhelming abilities.
posts.author: Wonjun Choi ∙

chapters.title: The Swamp of the Alligator Snapping Turtle (1)

posts.postContent: When the ruthless Lord Tiwakan seizes the kingdom of Nauk, Princess Liene Arsac faces an impossible choice: marry her captor or watch her homeland crumble. But Lord Tiwakan isn’t just after power; he desires Liene, and his devotion stirs a mix of fear and undeniable attraction within her. With her former betrothed, Lafitte, still missing, Liene must decide whether to trust Tiwakan's promises or hold out hope for a rescue. As dangerous secrets come to light, Liene’s decision could change the fate of Nauk—and her own heart—forever.
posts.author: Lee yuna

posts.postTitle: My Best Friend is an Eldritch Horror
posts.postContent: Good things come to those who wait. Damien Vale didn't, and now he's bound to an Eldritch creature from beyond the farthest reaches of the universe. It's unfathomable, utterly evil, and likes to be called Henry. To Damien, none of that mattered. He was going to learn magic, and he'd be damned if he let something as small as this set him back.
posts.alternativeTitles: My Best Friend is an Eldritch Horror
posts.author: Actus

posts.postContent: Aaron Steelegard's fortune was basically set as he discovered a book that allowed him to trade across dimensions—until his enemies take both his life and his riches away. But Aaron is brought back as his younger self, armed with his past knowledge and a chance at revenge! Now free to amass coins, he's gaining powerful abilities and moving up the ranks of the interdimensional trading markets. Will Aaron gain enough coins to survive this journey of vengeance and reclaim his honor?
posts.author: Mokhyen, Hong Dae Eui

posts.postContent: Edele Lancaster is the perfect noble lady who has been groomed for the job. But when her husband whom she married reluctantly commits treason, she is branded a traitor and becomes a slave. Distraught, she tries to kill herself to preserve honor as a noble lady, but her new master, Count Laslo Krissus prevents her from doing so. Will Edele be able to find freedom and happiness in her new life as Count Krissus’ maid?
posts.author: Candlebambi

posts.postTitle: Return of the Sword God-Rank Civil Servant
posts.postContent:
[By the Studio that brought you {Margrave’s Bastard Son was The Emperor}! and the Author that brought you {The Rebirth of an 8th-Circled Wizard}!

Sword God, Ahn Su-ho.
Surprisingly, humanity's greatest swordsman player was a civil servant hunter affiliated with the Korean Hunter Association.
Su-ho chose the path of a public servant purely to end the gates.

Perhaps that’s why?
When one of the disaster-level gates, called the final gate, was attacked,
In an ironic turn of events, he was betrayed by his comrades.

“It would have been better if he had joined us from the beginning. Public servants are so stubborn."

The reason his comrades betrayed him?
Because if the gates were closed, their influence would disappear. 

Is this the end?

Just as Su-ho’s consciousness was fading away,

[Rebooting the system of player Ahn Su-ho.]
The system gave Su-ho one more chance.
A chance to go back to the past and set everything right.
